title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
content: Maybe I am the only one that missed this interview.I share it here:"Preserving the History of Bitcoin with George Moses, Curator of the Bitcoin Museum"https://player.fm/series/the-charlie-shrem-show/preserving-the-history-of-bitcoin-with-george-moses-curator-of-the-bitcoin-museum

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Yes, is a good listen.Wish he could comment here...but has been locked out for quite some time

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Listened it 2 times whilst working on the Itokawa Timebank. Such a relaxed, funny & informative talk...worth every minuteEnjoy it with a delicious Margerita in the sun🥳

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Moses is a great asset to our community. He just needs to create a new account if they are not going to unlock his old one.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Thanks for sharing Frank. Loved this podcast. It's interesting while listening, I immediately thought, 'Oh man, These are my people' They get it. Normally I see an article here or there and while they might cover some topic of physical bitcoin, but really they don't really know anything or care.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on September 08, 2023, 05:28:11 PMThanks for sharing Frank. Loved this podcast. It's interesting while listening, I immediately thought, 'Oh man, These are my people' They get it. Normally I see an article here or there and while they might cover some topic of physical bitcoin, but really they don't really know anything or care.   Yep gotta agree.....felt right at home listening to this.....even though I listened to it awhile back,,,listened to it again.   I do hope that Museum does open up someday...then perhaps I can fly down to FLorida and see the rest of the collectors that live in that area.     ALso...why was he locked out? And why didnt he create a new account?     Too bad....he is a great collector and is surely missed here!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on September 08, 2023, 07:06:17 PMQuote from: Steeley on September 08, 2023, 05:28:11 PMThanks for sharing Frank. Loved this podcast. It's interesting while listening, I immediately thought, 'Oh man, These are my people' They get it. Normally I see an article here or there and while they might cover some topic of physical bitcoin, but really they don't really know anything or care.   Yep gotta agree.....felt right at home listening to this.....even though I listened to it awhile back,,,listened to it again.   I do hope that Museum does open up someday...then perhaps I can fly down to FLorida and see the rest of the collectors that live in that area.     ALso...why was he locked out? And why didnt he create a new account?     Too bad....he is a great collector and is surely missed here!Maybe being a newb on a fresh account could be the dilemma. Kind of a downer

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Should be an easy one to create a brand new Account and verify with a small transaction to a trusted member to show that it only can be Moses who sent the funds...need the Selassiesoldier back🤗🍀
